alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued June 23 at 2:06AM MDT until June 23 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the first Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 108 expected. For the second Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 109 expected. * WHERE...Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...For the first Heat Advisory, from Noon today to 8 PM MDT this evening. For the second Heat Advisory, from Noon to 8 PM MDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. To reduce risk during outdoor work, the Occupational Safety and Health Administration recommends scheduling frequent rest breaks in shaded or air conditioned environments. Anyone overcome by heat should be moved to a cool and shaded location. Heat stroke is an emergency! Call 9 1 1.
